attributes.action: Step down as the PM now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have no faith in Tony Blair to act as leader of this country in my name. It is clear that he will step down soon anyway, and, as such, he holds little or no credibilty within his own cabinet, the wider political arena, or the British public. The longer he holds on, the greater damage is caused to Britain's political reputation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
